content: I'm considering the Bahamas or Jamaica, but I'm not sure which one is better for a relaxing vacation. By the way, I recently got an email about a sale on flights to the Caribbean, so I'm hoping to score a good deal. Speaking of flights, I flew on United Airlines for the first time in over a year on January 10th to visit my sister in Chicago, and I was surprised they still offer complimentary snacks and drinks.
